success_test_cases.objective: Verify endpoint accepts all valid input values within equivalence partitions
preconditions: API server is running and accessible
Test environment is properly configured
Required headers (x-correlation-id, x-request-id, x-transaction-id) are available
steps: Set required headers (x-correlation-id, x-request-id, x-transaction-id) with valid UUIDs
Send GET request to /priorities/{id}
Verify response status indicates success
Verify response body structure matches specification
Log test result with timestamp and execution details
